extDescription.message: Provides additional features to Youtube. It can be used by checking the item you want to add.

optionsDescription.message: On this setting screen, the setting items are reflected immediately. However, the setting items are applied only to the current page, so if you want the settings to be reflected permanently, you need to save them. Also, if you want to use the saved contents on other pages, you need to reload the settings.

FullscreenChatDescription.message: View chat list in full screen

ChatTickerScrollDescription.message: Horizontal scrolling of Super Chat list
